Highlight!

Now we have Hightlight on site.

hen we are reading some article on web, more about code, the colors of the words are real important to understand what the code make.

Ex:

if(tired == 'true'){
  console.log('Drink some coffee!');
}

You can see the difference when the condition start and when finish. Thanks for plugins like Highlight.js that I'm using here. Now is time to keep studying pagination, the site need that.
